entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:47 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 1:47 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

Temperature: 4.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
